data.title: List of Ministers of Defence of the Netherlands
data.meta_description: The Minister of Defence (Dutch language: Minister van Defensie ) is the head of the Ministry of Defence and a member of the Cabinet of the Netherlands. Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert has been the Minister of Defence since 5 November 2012. For full list, see List of Ministers of Defence of the...
data.text:
Minister of Defence of the Netherlands Minister van Defensie

State Coat of the Kingdom of the Netherlands

Flag of the Kingdom of the Netherlands

Incumbent

Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert

since 5 November 2012

Ministry of Defence Her ExcellencyMember of Council of MinistersAppointer Mark Rutte

as Prime Minister of the NetherlandsFormation February 16, 1798; ago ( )First holder Gerrit Jan Pijman

(as Agent of War)Salary €144,000 (including €7,887.24 expenses)Website (English) Ministry of Defence

The Minister of Defence (Dutch language: Minister van Defensie ) is the head of the Ministry of Defence and a member of the Cabinet of the Netherlands. Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert has been the Minister of Defence since 5 November 2012.

List of Ministers of Defence[]

For full list, see List of Ministers of Defence of the Netherlands. (Dutch)
